name: Do You Even Forklift?
description:
Fork-Lift certification program

-------------------------------------------------------------

Use WASD to move, and SPACE to pickup and drop crates.  

The task is to pickup required items from input conveyer belts and place them on a cart on output feed.  

Doing this proficiently will grant you a certificate for (in game only) forklifts.
